message.title: Hi, I'm Buno!
message.description: I'm a bot attempting to recreate Uno:tm:, the well known card game from Mattel, Inc. All assets are owned by this company, and this bot is BY NO MEANS meant to be official.
message.invite-desc:
Sorry, you probably can't. This bot is private, and is not hosted on a powerful server. It would get rate-limited quite quickly too.
The only way to get it on your server is to be friend with the current developer.
 Oh wait nvm, maybe click the invite button below?

message.success:

public.name: public
public.description: Whenever to show or not the eval output

message.no-data: No one played Buno in this server! Run </{{name}}:{{id}}> to start a new game.

errors.alone: You can't start a game alone
errors.blacklisted:
You are blacklisted for the following reason:
{reason}
errors.execution: An error occured while executing this command.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to stop the game.
errors.gameInChannel: A game already exists on this channel :point_right: {{url}}
errors.gameJustStarted: The game just started, you can't do this now.
errors.gameNotFound: I'm sadly unable to find the game you're talking about.
errors.interactionError: An error occured while processing this interaction
errors.interactionNotHandled: This interaction has no handler. This should be addressed.
errors.noActions: The Actions menu isn't used for this game.
errors.noDrawStack: So... you want to draw cards while there's no cards to draw? Interesting...
errors.notAnInteger: The value must be a valid integer
errors.notContestingHost: Seriously? Are you trying to contest someone who's not the host?
errors.notInGame: You're not part of the game.
errors.notRunningWrongButton: You can't leave the game using that button.
errors.notTheHost: Only the host can do this.
errors.paginationForbidden: You are not allowed to control this pagination.
errors.playerLeft: You can't join a game you left.
errors.tooManyInGame: The game reached its maximum capacity ({{count}} players)
errors.unusable: You can't use this button right now.

components.back: Back to admin abuse panel home

embed.title: Edit the cards of a player
embed.description:
You can't:
- remove cards to have less than 3

edit.name: Edit cards
edit.value: Edit the cards of someone else

view.name: View cards
view.value: Check out the cards of another player

embed.title: Admin abuse panel
embed.description: Select the action you'd like to perform.

messages.contestAndFailed: **{{name}}** contested **{{host}}** admin abuse and failed. They drew **{{count}}** cards.
messages.contestAndKicked: **{{name}}** contested **{{host}}**'s admin abuse and won. **{{host}}** has been ejected from the game.

from.select: Select the target player to exchange cards with.

swap.text: Choose the player you want to swap cards from.

menu.title: Action menu
menu.description:
Need something else than just view or play cards? You're at the right place.
Here are the options you may use :

aa.name: ‚ö†Ô∏è - Open the admin abuse panel
aa.value: Use it whenever you're the host and want to admin abuse

challenge.name: üÉè - Challenge the previous player who hasn't yelled out "Buno out!"
challenge.value: Use it whenever the previous player forgot to yell "Buno out"

contestAa.name: üî® - Contest admin abuse
contestAa.value: Use it whenever you think the host admin abused.

contestDraw.name: ‚ùó - Contest the +4 forced drawing
contestDraw.value: Use it when you think previous player could play something else than +4

yell.name: üì£ - Yell "Buno out!"
yell.value: Use it right before you play your second last card.

afk.kicked: **{{name}}** was inactive and has been kicked.
afk.skipped: **{{name}}** was inactive and has been skipped.

contest.drew:
**{{name}}** pointed out that **{{drawer}}** forgot to yell "Buno out!"
**{{drawer}}** drew {{stack}} cards.
contest.tooManyCards: **{{name}} has too many cards to be able to yell "Buno out!"

yell.notEnough: You can only yell "Buno out!" when you have 2 cards.

card.allSwapped: All the players' cards have been swapped!
card.reversed: The player order has been reversed.
card.seven: You played a 7 card and shall now select a player to exchange your cards with.
card.unknown: **{{name}}** tried to play a non-existant card :clown:
card.unknownColor: **{{name}}** tried to set the collor a non-existant one :clown:

draw.drewAndSkipped: **{{name}}** drew **{{stack}}** cards and has been skipped.
draw.sab: **{{name}}** has been removed for attempting to sabotage the game

stats.players: üë• Players who took part in the game

end.noOne: No one was available to finish the game.

forceDraw.contestPlus4:
**{{name}}** contested **{cardPlayer}**'s +4 card and won.
**{{cardPlayer}}** drew **{{stack}}** cards
forceDraw.contestPlus4AndFail:
**{{name}}** contested **{{cardPlayer}}**'s +4 card and failed.
**{{name}}** drew {{stack}} cards
forceDraw.draw: **{name}** drew **{stack}** cards and has been skipped.
forceDraw.noCard: You don't have any card to play
forceDraw.noStacking: The Allow Stacking rule is disabled
forceDraw.noReverse: The Reverse Card rule is disabled

reverse.reverseMessage:
**{{name}}** drew **{{stack}}** cards and has been skipped, thanks to the reverse card power.
The player order has been reversed.

forceDraw.text: You have to respond, or draw {{stack}} cards.

lobby.modified: This game won't count towards the game leaderboard

game.startedAA: The admin abuse gamemode is enabled for this game. You can eject the host if you think they are abusing by opening the Actions menu

leave.leaveAsHost: You can't leave the game as host.
leave.prompt: Are you sure you want to leave the game? You won't be able to rejoin the game.

embed.title: Game settings
embed.footer: Settings are automatically saved per guild, and per member.

options.resendGameMessage: Resend the game message every few messages
options.canJoinMidgame: Allow players to hop in midgame
options.shouldYellBUNO: Users should yell Buno Out! in order to win
options.reverseAnything: Reverse card can reverse force draws
